TEXT.S:
cacay 1 / cacay ku luma' i buyu' ni Panay. / ka lacacay ku nizateng nu mita.
siwkay nu cacay teban i inayi' atu tusa. u asip nu Sakizaya. nu aayawan a asip sa ku "tinacay". u babalakiay a asip kuyza. u nikayadah a sulit.
tinaku a kamu cacay1 hacacacacay / hacacacacay sa mipalita tu pisakakawawan. hacacay / sima hacacay kami makaala tu kawlah. sacacay / sacacay sa ciniza a mauzip. sakacacay / sakacacay a kawaw sa a hicaen nu mita?
cacay2 lacacay ; / ka lacacay ku nizateng nu mita. lacacayen / lacacayen nu mita! malacacay / malacacay ku nizateng tu sakay kawaw nu niyazu'. malacacay ku niyazu'ay nu heni. masacacay / masacacay ku balucu' tawya icelang kita. palacacayen / palacacayen ku nipipazeng!
u sulit nu Hulam Lipun atu Amilika 1/02 1 (one, also called unit, unity, and (multiplicative) identity) is a number, numeral, and glyph. It represents a single entity, the unit of counting or measurement. For example, a line segment of unit length is a line segment of length 1. It is also the first of the infinite sequence of natural numbers, followed by 2. 10 0 2 1 "" 0 1 1stfirst unus uni-
